org.tribuo.math.util

Class MatrixHeapMerger

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.tribuo.math.util.MatrixHeapMerger
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Merger

    public class MatrixHeapMerger
extends Object
implements Merger
    Merges each DenseSparseMatrix using a PriorityQueue as a heap on the MatrixIterator.

    Relies upon MatrixIterator.compareTo(MatrixIterator).

    See Also:
